root: ^I hope you are well. I have been praying for you.
^Would you like me to go over your current quest again?

c-0: ^I will pray for you to return again, then. Best of luck.
c-1: ^The Beasts in this area seem to obey a "leader" of sorts. Our previous foraging team found this Beast's location, yet never returned.
^I believe they said it was to the North-East after entering the Enchanted Forest. You may follow the main path to orient yourself on the way.
^The Beasts are weaker in sunlight, so perhaps this hiding spot is not out in plain sight. Try looking around the mountains.
^I wish you best of luck. And, as always, may God bless you.
